values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_FREEDOM_SWEEPS_2
values.value:
We still kneel to the weirwood trees, are judged by their pained faces, lay our sins before them as naked as babes. A day will come when the Seven are forsaken for another faith, but the Old Gods will watch us until our dying days.

Honor the Old Gods with EXTRA GOLD and bonus rewards for Shrine Prayers all week long! Also during the Honor the Old Gods:

*Look out for 24 hour runs of power-progressing events!
*Pray to the Shrine for bonus rewards all week long!

Using Gems to redeem bundles in the Store awards points towards this event.
If the purchases made with Gems contain Gold, that Gold will contribute to the progress of the separate Iron Bank's Prosperity events. Daily Deliveries and Rewards Passes only award points for initial gold received at the time of purchase. Rewards must be collected before the promotion ends.

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_JONSNOW2_CRAFT_9
values.value:
The fastest mode of travel in Westeros is by dragonback, a privilege few have experienced since before the fall of House Targaryen. That Daenerys would trust Jon to ride one of her dragons shows how much their relationship has grown. The fact that Rhaegal allows him him to approach without protest is perhaps even more meaningful. The dragons may recognize something that Jon has yet to understand himself...

Craft any Season VIII event gear to earn points! Earn materials for select gear sets by defeating creatures in the Married in Secret event, or by trading Flux in the Recipes tab of your Inventory.

Season VIII Gear Sets: Targaryen Royal, Valyrian Champion, Festival Carouser, Dragon Rider, Valyrian Bloodmage, Living Mountain, Northern Noble

Part of the 'Wolf Reborn' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_JONSNOW3_CRAFT_1
values.value:
Tonight, a grim mood hushes the halls of Winterfell—the army of the dead will arrive before morning. Jon stands atop the castle walls with his former brothers in black. There is solace to be found in how far they have come, but the revelation of Jon's royal blood lingers. It drives him down into the crypt to look upon the statue of Lyanna Stark, the mother he never knew... and when Daenerys joins him he can't help but tell her the truth.

Craft any event gear to earn points! Steel Scales materials for the Lost Targaryen gear set are available in other Lost Dragon events. 
Part of the 'Lost Dragon' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_JONSNOW3_CRAFT_2
values.value:
The Iron Fleet burns, the Golden Company has fallen, and the city bells toll the surrender of Cersei's remaining forces—but madness subsumes all reason. Daenerys flies into a rage, indiscriminately raining dragonfire on all of King's Landing, and her army follows suit. Unsullied and northmen alike slaughter and pillage, corrupted by fire and blood. Jon commands them to fall back, but his calls fall on deaf ears...

Craft any Trinket to earn points! Earn materials for the Iron Throne Remembrance Trinket by defeating creatures in the In the Dragon's Shadow event. 
Part of the 'Lost Dragon' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_JONSNOW3_PVE_1
values.value:
The Long Night is full of terrors—a blazing charge of Dothraki screamers swallowed by darkness, an endless horde of wights overwhelming the castle, the Night King emerging unscathed from dragonflame... Jon will never forget what he witnessed nor the mournful day that followed, in which the gray sky turned black with the smoke of the funeral pyres. The Great War is over, but the Battle of Winterfell will haunt him forever.
Defeat Wights, Wight Giants, and Armored White Walkers to earn points!
Part of the 'Lost Dragon' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_JONSNOW3_PVE_2
values.value:
Ashes fall on the ruins of King's Landing, a funeral shroud for thousands of fallen innocents—nothing could justify such carnage. Jon knows it to be true, though he would rather forget. He knows it as Daenerys promises her cheering army they will 'liberate' the entire world, as Tyrion asks of him the impossible. And so he makes the long walk to the Iron Throne, each step heavier than the last...

Defeat any non-event creature on the map to earn points! While this event is active, non-event creatures drop materials for the new Iron Throne Remembrance trinket, which can be crafted for points in the Battle of King's Landing event. 
Part of the 'Lost Dragon' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_JONSNOW3_PVE_RALLY_1
values.value:
Jon and Daenerys stand alone in the destroyed throne room, carpeted in freshly fallen ash. He begs for an end to her brutal tactics, for a world of mercy, but he sees the flames of the conquerer in her eyes as she insists that is precisely what she's building, that she knows what is good... and that anyone who says otherwise is wrong. She softens, entreating him to walk this path with her.
"You are my Queen, now and always," Jon promises.
They kiss, and he slides a dagger into her heart.
Defeat Conqueror's Unsullied to earn points!
Part of the 'Lost Dragon' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_JONSNOW3_TRADE_1
values.value:
With the Night King vanquished, the would-be Queen of the Seven Kingdoms is frustrated by what she lacks: the love of the people, the cooperation of her allies, and Jon Snow's amorous advances. A string of devastating losses follow—Rhaegal, Missandei, the faith of her closest advisors—and she withdraws further into her own mind. Varys implores Jon to lay claim to the Iron Throne and is executed a traitor for it. Still, Jon stands by his Queen.

Braavosi Loan trophy recipes are available while this event is active. Exchange Braavosi Loan trophies in the Recipes tab of your Inventory to earn points! 
Part of the 'Lost Dragon' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_JONSNOW3_TRADE_2
values.value:
After weeks of imprisonment, a broken Jon Snow is released. The Unsullied wanted him dead; his sisters wished him free; his brother, the new king Bran, has chosen to exile him to what remains of the Night's Watch. Once more, Jon must leave his family and home behind. But as he rides north of the Wall, he looks back at the closing gate, the Free Folk walking beside him, Ghost leading the way... and he spurs his horse on with a new sense of purpose.

Exchange Braavosi Loan trophies in the Recipes tab of your Inventory to earn points. This event's Recipes are your last chance to use Braavosi Loan trophies before they can only be exchanged for Trader's Scrip! 
Part of the 'Lost Dragon' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_JONSNOW3_UMBRELLA_1
values.value:
The honorable path is never easy, and once again, Jon Snow finds his fealties tested. He has promised his love and loyalty to Queen Daenerys and harbors no desire to rule, and yet the truth of his own lineage threatens to unravel all... if the Night King to the north and Cersei to the south don't destroy all he holds dear first.

Look for these Featured Rewards throughout the The Lost Dragon event:
* Steel Scales are used to craft the Lost Targaryen gear set!
* Iron Throne Remembrance Scrap is used to craft the Iron Throne Remembrance trinket!
* Braavosi Loan trophies can be traded for prizes in the Recipes tab of your Inventory while the Mad Queen or Last Targaryen events are active. Remember to use all your Braavosi Loan trophies before the Last Targaryen event ends!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_ARCGEAR_192
values.value: Prepare for the new Lost Targaryen gear set!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_ARCGEAR_193
values.value: Use Steel Scales to craft this commanding gear!

values.value: Craft these pants and stand defiant with your infantry!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_DRAGON_62
values.value: Master the care of your dragon with this cache of mysterious tomes!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_HEROES_147

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_STANDALONE_RECIPE_MARCHSLOT
values.value: While this event is active, you can trade Writs to grant yourself an additional March Slot for 8-hours. The new recipe is available in the Item Exchange under Basic Recipes. Recipe events are temporary.

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_STANDALONE_TRINFECTA2_CRAFT_1
values.value:
The weight of knowledge is a heavy burden, but someone must bear it.

Craft any Trinket to earn points! Earn materials by defeating non-event creatures in the Three-Eyed Raven: Perception II event for the following Trinket Collections:

House Manderly, Valyrian Dragon, House Baratheon, Artifacts of R'hllor, House Whent Heirlooms

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_STANDALONE_TRINFECTA2_PVE_1
values.value:
A single well-placed strike can turn the tide of battle. Know your enemy's weakness and exploit it.

Defeat any non-event creature on the map to earn points! While this event is active, non-event creatures drop materials for trinkets, which can be crafted for points in the Three-Eyed Raven: Intuition II event. Materials earned come from the following Trinket Collections:

House Manderly, Valyrian Dragon, House Baratheon, Artifacts of R'hllor, House Whent Heirlooms

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_TESTYOURMETTLE
values.value: In the throes of battle, a legend is born! From the most unlikely of contenders, a Lord can ascend to the summit of power and glory. For 24 hours, they put everything on the line against rival Lords, risking their name for the promise of glory, and perhaps even infamy. The opportunity is yours to seize, to enter the crucible, and test your mettle against other mighty Lords from other kingdoms. Journey forth and claim a Seat of Power, defend it with all your might and inscribe your name in the annals of history. In the end, your actions will judge your valor by how long you're capable of holding onto a Seat of Power. But beware, others are vying for glory. Are you prepared to Test Your Mettle?

values.name: ACTIVITY_SPLASH_JONSNOW3_TRADE_1
values.value: "Every time a Targaryen is born, the gods toss a coin, and the world holds its breath."

values.name: ACTIVITY_SPLASH_WRIT_RECIPE_MARCHSLOT
values.value: Event-limited Extra March Slot recipe now available!

values.name: ALCHEMY_RECIPE_EVENT_SNOW3_TROPHY_GENERIC_DESC

values.name: CHAT_COMPLIANCE_ALERT

values.name: DRAGON_INFO_TRAINING_PARAGRAPH_6
values.value:
Begins at Dragon Level 20
Adolescent dragons can learn the powerful defensive combat ability Repel Strike (research unlocks LV 27), and eventually grow strong enough to attack enemy Keeps (research unlocks LV 31). Beginning at this phase, the appearance of the dragon’s horns can be customized.

values.name: HOUSE_OF_THE_DRAGON_EVENT_DESC
values.value: Join us for a multiple-month adventure looking at the life and times of one Jon Snow. Keep your eyes peeled for limited-time rewards available during this time!

values.name: ITEM_EVENT_REWARDBOX_RANDOMEVENTMATERIALS_S8_Q1_DESC
values.value: Contains one type of Season VIII crafting material, such as Targaryen Embroidery, Gilded Plates, Silk Brocade, Dragon Tempered Fabrics, Ritual Cloths, Dark Steel Plate, and Northern Fox Pelts.

values.name: ITEM_EVENT_REWARDBOX_RANDOMEVENTMATERIALS_S8_Q2_DESC
values.value: Contains one type of Season VIII crafting material, such as Targaryen Embroidery, Gilded Plates, Silk Brocade, Dragon Tempered Fabrics, Ritual Cloths, Dark Steel Plate, and Northern Fox Pelts. Guaranteed to be minimum Quality of Common or better.

values.name: ITEM_EVENT_REWARDBOX_RANDOMEVENTMATERIALS_S8_Q3_DESC
values.value: Contains one type of Season VIII crafting material, such as Targaryen Embroidery, Gilded Plates, Silk Brocade, Dragon Tempered Fabrics, Ritual Cloths, Dark Steel Plate, and Northern Fox Pelts. Guaranteed to be minimum Quality of Fine or better.

values.name: ITEM_FLUX_TRINKET_1_DESCRIPTION
values.value: While recipes are active, exchange this item to get trinket materials from Trinket I armory collections, including House Arryn, House Mormont, House Targaryen, House Martell, and Artifacts of Winter. Flux recipes are useable in future events

values.name: ITEM_FLUX_TRINKET_2_DESCRIPTION
values.value: While recipes are active, exchange this item to get trinket materials from Trinket II armory collections, including House Manderly, Valyrian Dragon, House Baratheon, Artifacts of R'hllor, and House Whent Heirlooms. Flux recipes are useable in future events.

values.name: ITEM_FLUX_TRINKET_3_DESCRIPTION
values.value: While recipes are active, exchange this item to get trinket materials from Trinket III armory collections, including House Stark, House Lannister, House Greyjoy, Artifacts of Astapor, and Night's Watch Artifacts. Flux recipes are useable in future events.

values.name: ITEM_FLUX_TRINKET_4_DESCRIPTION
values.value: While recipes are active, exchange this item to get trinket materials from Trinket IV armory collections, including House Baelish, Dothraki Heirlooms, House Tyrell, Conqueror's Heirlooms, Targaryen Prince Artifacts, and Dragon Rider Artifacts. Flux recipes are useable in future events.

values.name: LEADERBOARD_JONSNOW3_CRAFT_LB_2_PRIZE_TITLE
values.value: Battle of King's Landing (The Lost Dragon)

values.name: LEGAL_TEXT_2
values.value: WARNER BROS. GAMES LOGO, WB SHIELD: ™ & © Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc. (s23)

values.name: MONSTER_BADGE_REWARDS_CARAVAN_CRAFTING_SEASON_8_DESC
values.value:
Defeating this caravan offers significant amounts of Steel and Season VIII Crafting Materials.

Steel and Crafting Materials are used to forge equipment.

values.name: MONSTER_JONSNOW3_1_DESC
values.value: These warriors have journeyed across the narrow sea for their queen and will follow her onto any battlefield.

values.name: MONSTER_JONSNOW3_2_DESC
values.value: "They were touched by White Walkers, that's why they came back. That's why their eyes turned blue. Only fire will stop them." - Samwell Tarly

values.name: MONSTER_JONSNOW3_3_DESC
values.value: "The White Walkers don't care if a man's free folk or crow, we're all the same to them, meat for their army. But together, we can beat them."

values.name: MONSTER_JONSNOW3_4_DESC
values.value: Tales of giants that inhabit the Land of Always Winter make for fine stories around the hearth. Facing one, with rotted flesh and eyes like glowing ice, is something else entirely.

values.name: PROPERTY_DRAGON_MARCHSIZEVSPLAYERSOP
values.value: Dragon Max March Size vs. Player Seat of Power

values.name: PROPERTY_DRAGON_MARCHSIZEVSPLAYERSOP_DESC
values.value: Increases maximum march size when attacking a player owned Seat of Power with your dragon.

values.name: PROPERTY_DRAGON_MARCHSIZEVSPLAYERSTRATEGICTERRAIN
values.value: Dragon Max March Size vs Strategic Terrain

values.name: PROPERTY_DRAGON_MARCHSIZEVSPLAYERSTRATEGICTERRAIN_DESC
values.value: Increases maximum march size when attacking a Strategic Terrain with your dragon.

values.name: SESSIONREWARD_CSR_ES_SNOW3_DESC
values.value: Claim up to four rewards every 24 hours from the Lost Dragon event. The fourth reward contains a valuable Instant Boost!

values.name: SYSTEM_MESSAGE_TESTYOURMETTLE_STARTEVENT
values.value:
Lords from across multiple kingdoms compete against each other by taking and holding Seats of Power! This competition is bracketed by Lord level, providing a neutral kingdom where players of similar power can participate in the event to earn points and rewards. Players can only join the neutral kingdom that is appropriate for their level and they can return to their home kingdom at any point during the event. At the end of the event, lords will automatically return to their home kingdoms. 
Special buffs are provided to those traveling to the neutral kingdom, protecting their troops from dying and also providing combat bonuses for attacking and defending Seats of Power. In this event, the number of troops, type of gear, gear quality, and strategic timing will make all the difference.

Event Rules
-> Capture Seats of Power in the new kingdom to gain event points.
-> Seats will lock and unlock on a schedule.
-> At the end of the event, the top players will be rewarded the best rewards.

Good luck and thank you for playing Games of Thrones: Conquest

values.name: DRIVEN_DRAGONFEEDXPBONUS_ALPHA_DESCRIPTION
values.value: Bonus to XP from Feeding your dragon
